mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (MEMBERID, MEMBERPW, MEMBERNAME, MEMBERBIRTHDAY, MEMBERPHONE, MEMBERADDR, JOINDAY, LIBCODE, RENTALCOUNT, MEMBERPAYMENTSTATUS) VALUES (#{MEMBERID}, #{MEMBERPW}, #{MEMBERNAME}, #{MEMBERBIRTHDAY}, #{MEMBERPHONE}, #{MEMBERADDR}, now(), #{LIBCODE}, #{RENTALCOUNT}, #{MEMBERPAYMENTSTATUS});
